RumorFact.Text: Supposedly, the stranded Nomai found a strange campsite on a planetoid in the large dimension. They should have marked it with a signal beacon.

ExploreFact.Text: I found a strange campsite on the north pole of a large planetoid.
A text in the campsite mentioned a soil analysis lab somewhere on this planetoid.
I found a number of Nomai texts detailing their attempts to contact the person who made this campsite.
One of the texts mentioned that an alien tried to lead the Nomai through a node in an enclosed area. Supposedly, I can use the node in the center of the large dimension to access this enclosed area.

RumorFact.Text: I found some text that says there should be a soil lab somewhere on Lover's Rock

ExploreFact.Text: I found some text remarking that Lover's Rock seems to be made of the remains of many planets.
